title: Scott Thompson | A Closer Look: Trump Breaks Silence on Stormy Daniels as Russia Probe Heats Up
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Trump floating the possibility of shuffling his Cabinet and breaking his silence on the Stormy Daniels scandal as the Russia investigation heats up.

Then, Scott Thompson admits to having a crush on Seth, and talks about how he joined The Kids in the Hall and when he knew the troupe's show was a success.

After that, Scott continues the conversation backstage with Late Night producer Kevin Miller exclusively for this podcast.


LATE NIGHT ON SOCIAL
